statements: SELECT * FROM governance_audit_trail
SELECT decision_maker, decision_made, decision_date FROM governance_audit_trail ORDER BY decision_date DESC
SELECT id, action_type, decision_maker FROM governance_audit_trail WHERE action_type = 'approve'
SELECT * FROM governance_audit_trail WHERE decision_maker LIKE 'John%'
SELECT id, action_type, decision_date FROM governance_audit_trail ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM governance_audit_trail WHERE decision_maker = 'Alice' ORDER BY decision_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, action_type FROM governance_audit_trail WHERE action_type = 'approval'
SELECT decision_maker, action_type FROM governance_audit_trail WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01' AND decision_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY decision_date ASC
SELECT * FROM governance_audit_trail WHERE action_type = 'denial' AND decision_maker IN ('Bob', 'Charlie')
SELECT DISTINCT decision_maker, COUNT(*) AS total_decisions FROM governance_audit_trail GROUP BY decision_maker HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_decisions DESC
SELECT decision_id, decision_description, decision_date, decision_owner, decision_status FROM governance_decisions;
SELECT * FROM governance_decisions WHERE decision_owner = 'John Doe';
SELECT decision_id, decision_description FROM governance_decisions WHERE decision_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM governance_decisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT decision_owner, COUNT(*) AS decision_count FROM governance_decisions GROUP BY decision_owner;
SELECT * FROM governance_decisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC, decision_owner ASC
SELECT decision_description, decision_owner FROM governance_decisions WHERE decision_status='Approved'

SELECT * FROM governance_actions JOIN governance_decisions ON governance_actions.decision_id = governance_decisions.decision_id WHERE action_date >= '2022-01-01' AND decision_status='Pending' ORDER BY action_date ASC
SELECT MAX(action_date) AS latest_action_date FROM governance_actions
SELECT decision_owner, COUNT(*) AS decision_count FROM governance_decisions GROUP BY decision_owner HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY decision_count DESC, decision_owner ASC
SELECT * FROM decision_audit_trail;
SELECT decision_text, decision_maker FROM decision_audit_trail;
SELECT action_description, action_taker, action_date FROM action_audit_trail;
SELECT decision_text, decision_maker, decision_date FROM decision_audit_trail WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT action_description, action_taker FROM action_audit_trail WHERE action_taker = 'John Doe';
-- Select all columns from decision_audit_trail table sorted by decision_date in descending order
SELECT * FROM decision_audit_trail ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
-- Select distinct decision_makers from decision_audit_trail table where decision_text contains the word 'approve'
SELECT DISTINCT decision_maker FROM decision_audit_trail WHERE decision_text LIKE '%approve%';
-- Select action_description, action_taker, and action_date from action_audit_trail where action_taker is not null and action_date is in the current year
SELECT action_description, action_taker, action_date FROM action_audit_trail WHERE action_taker IS NOT NULL AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM action_date) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE);
-- Select decision_id, action_id, and decision_text from decision_action_link table joined with decision_audit_trail and action_audit_trail tables

SELECT DAL.decision_id, DAL.action_id, DAT.decision_text FROM decision_action_link AS DAL JOIN decision_audit_trail AS DAT ON DAL.decision_id = DAT.id JOIN action_audit_trail AS AAT ON DAL.action_id = AAT.id;
-- Select decision_text from decision_audit_trail table where decision_maker is 'John Doe' and decision_date is after '2022-01-01'
SELECT decision_text FROM decision_audit_trail WHERE decision_maker = 'John Doe' AND decision_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM decision_audit_trail;
SELECT decision_name, decision_date FROM decision_audit_trail WHERE decision_id = 1;
SELECT action_name, action_date, action_executor FROM action_audit_trail WHERE action_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, participant_role FROM decision_participants WHERE decision_id = 2 ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM decision_outcomes WHERE outcome_evaluation IS NOT NULL AND outcome_evaluation <> '' ORDER BY outcome_id DESC;
SELECT decision_name, decision_date, decision_maker FROM decision_audit_trail ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM action_audit_trail WHERE action_executor = 'John Doe';
SELECT decision_name, decision_description FROM decision_audit_trail WHERE decision_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM decision_participants WHERE decision_id = 1002 AND participant_role = 'Manager';

SELECT decision_name, outcome_name, outcome_evaluation FROM decision_audit_trail INNER JOIN decision_outcomes ON decision_audit_trail.decision_id = decision_outcomes.decision_id ORDER BY outcome_evaluation DESC;
SELECT * FROM governance_decisions;
SELECT decision_id, decision_type, decision_date FROM governance_decisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM governance_actions WHERE action_type='Meeting';
SELECT action_type, action_date FROM governance_actions WHERE action_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT dm.maker_name, dm.maker_role, da.action_type FROM decision_makers dm INNER JOIN decision_actions da ON dm.maker_id = da.maker_id;
SELECT * FROM governance_decisions
SELECT decision_id, decision_type FROM governance_decisions WHERE decision_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT d.decision_description, a.action_description FROM governance_decisions d JOIN governance_actions a ON d.decision_id = a.action_id
SELECT maker_name, maker_role FROM decision_makers WHERE maker_role = 'CEO'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_decisions FROM governance_decisions
